original: Bergh, Ernst Leonard, postmästare, Falkenberg, f. 28/6/87 i Kristianstad av postiljon E. P. B. o. Maria Frid. G. 13 m. Alf rida Maria Cecilia Paradis. Barn: Carl Magnus f. 14, Lars Emil’ 20. — M’og:ex. i Kristianstad 07. E. o. postexp. 08, postass. 25, fcontr. i Nässjö 43, postmäst. i Falkenberg sed. 46. GM 8 st.
translated: Bergh, Ernst Leonard, Postmaster, Falkenberg, born June 28, 1887 in Kristianstad to postilion E.P.B and Maria Frid. Married for 13 years to Alf rida Maria Cecilia Paradis. Children: Carl Magnus born in 1914, Lars Emil in 1920. Married and divorced in Kristianstad in 1907. Became a postal worker in 1908, post assistant in 1925, manager in Nässjö in 1943, and postmaster in Falkenberg since 1946. Married 8 times.
